mapper.select: select nid, ntitle, ncontent, to_char(ndate,'yyyy.mm.dd'), nhits from banana_notice where nid =#{nid}

select rno, nid, ntitle from (select * from (select rownum rno, nid, ntitle, ncontent, to_char(ndate,'yyyy.mm.dd'), nhits from (select * from banana_notice order by ndate desc))) n where n.rno=(select rno from (select rownum rno, nid, ntitle, ncontent, to_char(ndate,'yyyy.mm.dd'), nhits from (select * from banana_notice order by ndate desc)) where nid=#{nid})-1

select rno, nid, ntitle from (select * from (select rownum rno, nid, ntitle, ncontent, to_char(ndate,'yyyy.mm.dd'), nhits from (select * from banana_notice order by ndate desc))) n where n.rno=(select rno from (select rownum rno, nid, ntitle, ncontent, to_char(ndate,'yyyy.mm.dd'), nhits from (select * from banana_notice order by ndate desc)) where nid=#{nid})+1
mapper.update: update banana_notice set Ntitle=#{ntitle}, Ncontent=#{ncontent} where Nid=#{nid}
